text: (light upbeat music)
- [Narrator] Is your software company
looking to grow globally?

Maybe you wanna launch your
hero product in a new country.

Or reduce your reliance
on existing customers
by entering new markets.

To help fast-track your
international growth,

you can now apply to
join AWS Global Passport.

Get support, advice, and
guidance from AWS specialists
to plan your journey with confidence.
From understanding target markets
to gaining insight on customer preferences

or connecting with local
suppliers and partners,

we'll help you hit the
ground running from day one.

We can also advise on which
laws and regulations to consider
and what technologies

will give your expansion
the best chance of success.

The process starts with a
half day discovery workshop.

You'll then receive
tailored recommendations,

including a technical
framework, a compliance roadmap,
and a joint go-to-market plan.

Next, we'll regroup to
define actionable next steps.

This will help de-risk
your expansion plans
so you can achieve senior buy-in
and get the green light to grow.
This approach has already helped companies
like Soracom and Buildkite
expand their operations into new markets.
And you could achieve similar benefits.

New customers, more revenue,
stronger resilience.
Apply today to accelerate your growth
with AWS Global Passport.
(light upbeat music)
